post.author: 이성기
post.content: Checkup Point for mini J2EE project =================================== 1. environment setup (default - jdk1.3, j2eesdk 1.3, rational rose, Utlraedit or your JAVA IDE ) 2. prototype scenario definition 3. j2ee developing procedure or tool 4. master time plan and task allocation
post.title: environment setup and plan
